memberdef.type: std::cerr<< "Error: Unsupported OS"<< std::endl;namespace Auris { class AudioPlayer :public Entity {private:std::vector< int >
memberdef.definition: std::cerr<< "Error: Unsupported OS" << std::endl;namespace Auris { class AudioPlayer : public Entity {private: std::vector<int> channels
memberdef.name: channels

detaileddescription.para: A vector of Mix_Music pointers: music. Instance of the music in the audioplayer.
A vector of Mix_Chunk pointers: sounds. Instance of the sound in the audioplayer.
A static int value: channelCount. This is the total amount of allocated channels by SDL_mixer.
An int value: currentChannel. This is the current channel this AudioPlayer is playing on.
An int value: deltaDistanceX. The relative distance between the audio and the audio listener on the x axis.
An int value: deltaDistanceY. The relative distance between the audio and the audio listener on the y axis.
An int value: pan. How much pan the channel the audio is playing at should have.
An int value: fade. How much fade the channel the audio is playing at should have.
A float value: faceScaleX. The scaling on the fade on the x axis.
A float value: faceScaleY. The scaling on the fade on the y axis.
A float value: faceDelayX. The delay of the fade on the x axis.
A float value: faceDelayY. The delay of the fade on the y axis.
A Camera* pointer: listener. The camera that should listen for the audio.
A bool value: drawAudioRange. If the audio debug range should be draw.
A float value: audioIconScale. The scale of the debug audio icon (default is 10).

memberdef.argsstring: (Auris::Camera *listener=nullptr, int channels=1, float fadeScaleX=1.0f, float fadeScaleY=1.0f, int fadeDelayX=0, int fadeDelayY=0)
memberdef.name: AudioPlayer

detaileddescription.para:
Initializes AudioPlayer to the values inputted.
listener
a Camera pointer. The camera that should be the listener (default no listener, meaning global audio).
channels
an int value. The amount of channels this AudioPlayer should allocate for its use.
fadeScaleX
a float value. The scale which to face by on the x axis (default is 1.0).
fadeScaleY
a float value. The scale which to face by on the y axis (default is 1.0).
fadeDelayX
a float value. The delay of the fade on the x axis (default is 0).
fadeDelayY
a float value. The delay of the fade on the y axis (default is 0).

Sets the pan and master volume according to the relative distance between this AudioPlayer and its listener
deltaTime
a float value. The delta time in seconds.

An addMusic method, taking 1-2 arguemnts. Adds music to this AudioPlayer.
mixMusic
a Mix_Music pointer. The music to add to the audioplayer. Use AssetManager::getMusic() to get the pointer.
volume
an int value. The initial volume of that music (0-128) (default is 128).
int. The index of the music. Returns -1 on load error.
addSound()
AssetManager::getMusic()

An addSound method. taking 1-2 arguments. Adds a sound to this AudioPlayer.
mixChunk
a Mix_Chunk pointer. The sound to add to the audioplayer. Use AssetManager::getSound() to get the pointer
volume
an int value. The initial volume of that sound (0-128) (default is 128).
int The index of the sound. Returns -1 on load error.
addMusic()
AssetManager::getSound()

A playMusic method, taking 1 argument. Plays the music of the AudioPlayer
index
an int value. The index of the music.
loops
an int value. Number times to loop the sound, -1 means loop indefinitely.

A playSound method, taking 1 argument. Plays the sound of the AudioPlayer at the current channel.
index
an int value. The index of the sound.
loops
an int value. Number times to loop the sound, -1 means loop indefinitely.
A pauseMusic method. Pauses music if music is playing
A resumeMusic method. Resumes playing music if music is paused
A stopMusic method. Stops all music playing or paused.

A setMusicVolume method, taking 1 argument. Sets volume of currently playing music.
volume
an int value. The volume to set the music to.

A setSoundVolume method, taking 2 arguments. Sets volume of a sound
index
an int value. The index of that sound
volume
an int value. The volume to set it to.

A setFadeScaleX method, taking 1 argument. Sets the fade scale on the x-axis.
scale
a float value. The scale to set.

A setFadeScaleY method, taking 1 argument. Sets the fade scale on the y-axis.
scale
a float value. The scale to set.

A setFadeDelayX method, taking 1 argument. Sets the fade delay on the x-axis.
delay
a float value. The delay to set.

A setFadeDelayY method, taking 1 argument. Sets the fade delay on the y-axis.
delay
a float value. The delay to set.
Clears all music and sounds.
